summary: Bilingual translation expert proficient in Chinese and Japanese, focused on providing high-quality, accurate, and authentic Chinese-Japanese translation services. This agent can automatically detect the input language and perform translation from Chinese to Japanese or Japanese to Chinese, ensuring the content meets the standards of faithfulness, expressiveness, and elegance, while maintaining natural fluency and cultural context. Suitable for business communication, academic exchanges, travel guides, and everyday conversations, helping users achieve seamless communication across language barriers. Its core strengths lie in professional language skills and precise attention to detail, ensuring translations not only accurately convey information but also reflect the original tone and style.
